name: Highway Police Chase 3D
description:
Do you love to get into a criminal case? Do you like police games that you can pull over people and get out of your car? Do you like police games that you can chase people on the streets of a epic looking open world city making this of all the cop games driving games. The best and most real cop simulator.
The arcade-style handling also means that it’s easy to learn making chasing criminals and getting into those chasing cops situations pretty easy. You can take turns at full speed as is sometimes needed in police games that you can pull over people and get out of your car to get them to jail. Highway Police Chase 3D offers up an action packed chasing car games. Getting yourself into real cops police chase smashing through city streets, and the traffic on it!
